hero.title: Clinic Software
hero.description: Supporting clinic and hospital management with a comprehensive management system that helps you work efficiently. Compatible with various types, sizes, and branches of medical facilities.

system_functions.title: System Functions
system_functions.list2: Support for viewing sales across multiple branches simultaneously and by individual branch
system_functions.list3: Support for viewing profit/loss, Top Sales, doctors, and physiotherapists
system_functions.list4: Simple Control Shop - Easy management with single user control for all settings
system_functions.list6: Tiered commission system, doctor/physiotherapist/staff fees per session, hour, and percentage
system_functions.list7: Flexible document settings, chart of accounts, and more
system_functions.list8: Customer data management with international JCI/HL7 standard record keeping and history system
system_functions.list9: Support for family genetic linking and mental health history recording
system_functions.list10: Support for courses/examinations/Lab/X-Ray/coupons/membership cards (credit limit) with linked medications/equipment for cost tracking
system_functions.list14: Support for documents: Receipts/Tax Invoices/Bills/Purchase Orders/Transfer Forms/Appointments/Referrals/Medical Certificates/Sick Notes/10 Disease Certificates/Confined Space Certificates/Covid Certificates/Lab Orders/Lab Results/Patient Treatment Records (OPD Card)

all_reports.title: All Reports
all_reports.list24: Course Medicine Transfer and Adjustment Report
